Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your organization. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, the product is worth $15000 to you. After careful consideration, I am offering you this opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $12000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent value considering the product's true worth and the benefits it will provide. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss how we can make this valuable asset a part of your business strategy. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
